data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nel, André, Escuillie, François, Garrouste, Romain (2013): A new scoliid wasp in the Early Cretaceous Crato Formation in Brazil (Hymenoptera: Scoliidae). Zootaxa 3717 (3): 395-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3717.3.10
